item.title: Breaking News: Handsolo - A Revolution In The Mobile Phone Industry?
item.description: Qualcomm wets it feet again in the ice-cold/boiling-hot mixture of a sea that our Mobile Phone Industry is. They decided that the all the phone makers around the globe are just churning out junk upon the unsuspecting people. Claiming to take the bull by its horns, and revolutionizing the world that whirls around it, the touted features are: No Battery Required Unlimited Expandable Memory Completely Waterproof …and weight -> weightless
